O meu jogo favorito de FPS, é uma história envolvente, o clima, a imersão, a cada novo passo é uma nova surpresa, um novo desafio, um sentimento de desolação, de solidão e de heroísmo em meio a uma revolução. Vale muito a pena conhecer esse jogo. Aproveitem a promoção do Orange Box!

Great story, gameplay and overall a fantastic game

This is a really good game. I would personally say it is a bit overrated though. There are a lot of tedious sections in this game. Whether they are tedious for the time some simple tasks take or how annoying it can be to find something you need to progress. The gun fights are pretty basic and simple offering little challenge (unless you come up against the combine gunships and striders). But, it offers a solid 10-12 hours of gameplay, is very consistent in it's quality, has graphics that are still good to this date, and it always goes down to a dollar during any sale. Everyone can afford this game and should play it
Good game. I'm new to PC gaming so this was great for learning mouse and keyboard controls
Overwhelmingly overrated. The first few hours are repetitive and boring. Maybe it gets better later on. Not fun enough to get there, also no story for those that never played the first game.

Мне очень приятно было играть в эту игру.Следить за сюжетом и отсреливать врагов.Про игру можно сказать что её делали на совесть.В ней нет никаких консцен и никаких встроенных фильмов на игровом движке.Мы можем спокойно перемещаться во время диалогов.Игра пугает не скримерами не страшными лицами на весь экран.Она пугает именно атмосферой происходящего.Особенно понравился конец игры так как титры появляются на самом интересном месте и игра манит тебя сыграть в эпизод 1 и эпизод 2.Короче говоря игра классная всем советую.Почему они не делают Half-life 3?По моему у них либо нет идей,либо нет времени,или же нет того самого персонала для создания игры.Ну или они просто боятся делать новую  
так как могут испортить всю серию игр Half-life.

Fun :D

This game, is easily one of the best Fps' there is and quite possibly my personal favorite. It does everything nearly flawlessly, the story engaging and original, the characters memorable and fully realized, the world feels incredibly real and rich with atmosphere. Each area giving it's own unique feel. The gameplay runs smooth, and although defintley floaty, it is made to adapt to any players style. The source engine gives way to beautiful set pieces and with it's physics makes everything interactive and once again, feel so real. The animations on characters still hold up to most multi-million dollar games sent out today and in some cases manages to surpass it in how natural it looks. As for the flaws, it definitley has some, mostly from the combat. Although taking out enemies is satisfying it's far from the best shooting mechanics there is, with little gun variation. Although they do serve their purpose well enough it isn't an issue of it being bad, but more of it being medicore, which can be upsetting when so much else is done so well. And a few segments that during the first run are interesting and important to the plot will drag on upon future playthrough because these are not cutscenes, so you have to sit through these sections or take the time to break up gameplay by loading a future chapter. Ultimately though these are are minor complaints, I would still call this game a masterpiece as it is just such a well made, polished game that has so much to offer it's players. You never feel like an area was rushed, or any small section recieved less overview than another. From start to finish it is a great experience and one that any fan of shooters NEEDS to play through, at least once.

Sobrevalorado.
La historia del juego es generica pero no desastroza, es como una distopia adolescente pero hecha bien. 
Half Life sabe lo que es y no pretende mas y eso es lo que lo salva de ser una obra mediocre. Sabe que no tiene ningun significado mas alla de contar una historia palomitera para aderesar y dar contexto al Gameplay. Sabe que sus personajes no son la gran cosa y que rozan la unidimensionalidad aveces. Sabe que no quiere trasmitir ningun mensaje politico o filosofico. Es simplemente una historia para dar contextos a las situaciones del Gameplay.
Lo que salva a la historia de ser mediocre, es la quimica entre sus personajes que no es que sea la mejor del mundo pero es agradable ver los distintos matices y conflictos que se van dando aunque estos no sean realmente complejos.
La jugabilidad aveces es monotona, a diferencia de otros titulos como Silent Hill que utilizan los Puzzles para que te muevas en tu atmosfera y tengas que tomar coraje y adentrarte al pueblo, los puzzles solo vuelven lento el ritmo del juego y tenerlos cada dos por tres es muy frustrante.
Los graficos y las fisicas son bastante buenos para su epoca, aunque algo careciente de detalle.
La musica es bastante olvidable.
Le daria un 6/10 pero me la juego por un 7/10
7/10 - Sobrevaloradisimo.

半条命系列无疑是一款最牛逼的游戏，一直听说很好的口碑，但是并没有什么冲动去玩，这次打折很便宜就买了一套，第一代其实不想玩，因为画风不喜欢，毕竟是很老的游戏了，半条命2真的很牛逼，很多环节设计，连现在的很多类似游戏都没有的脑洞，从GMod就感觉到了他是多么万能，只有想不到，没有办不到。但是玩了七个小时就不想玩了，我没有3D眩晕症，但是活生生开船开车玩到想吐，还有战斗场面很像无主之地，玩腻了，但是玩了前几章我就真的感受到了这游戏是多牛逼，或许以后出重制版我会考虑玩，或者等到G胖会数3
